resources.string: Minimum age to create an account is 13 years old.
Your password needs at least 8 characters, 1 letter, 1 number and a special character.
Please enter a valid phone number.
It is necessary to enter at least your last name.
Receive email about your Squash activity and recommendations.
Personalize based on your inferred identity

Squash will always personalize your experience based on information you\'ve provided, as well as the devices you\'ve used to log in. When this setting is enabled, Squash may also personalize based on other inferences about your identity, like devices and browsers you haven\'t used to log in to Squash or email addresses and phone numbers similar to those linked to your Squash account.
Your Squash account has been successfully created. To proceed with the app, you need to confirm your email. We send an email with an explanation of the email explanation via verification code.
This email has already been used in another account, please change the email provided.
This mobile number is already in use, please change the number entered.
The specified username is not suitable, please change the username.
Servers have temporary failures, please try starting the app again later.
Hi, I\'m new here at Squash.
The code has been sent to %1$s, enter it below to verify your account.
When this account was created a verification email was sent but the account was not validated as the code was not entered in the field below, please enter the validation code in the box below.
If you have not obtained the validation code in your email, just click on the resend code button to receive the code.
We were unable to log into your account due to your email being pending.
If you leave this page your account will not be validated and you will not be able to login.\nReally want to leave?
It is not possible to start a conversation with this user at time.
Messages are all encrypted. No one outside of this chat, not even Squash, can read to them.
The following process is under development, however, it may fail to be used.\nAre you sure you want to proceed?
This website is using a secure connection.nInformation shared with this website, such as passwords or credit card numbers, is submitted securely
This site is not using a secure connection.\nInformation shared with this site, such as passwords or credit card numbers, is not sent securely
